_sText:
Ok, this map is based on the smash maps that are floating around on FPSbanana, more specifically the ones with cannons.

This map involves a team of 4 terrorists who try to prevent the counter-terrorists from making it across the map(an arsenal of AWPs awaits the CTs). There are a total of 8 turrets on the map that the terrorists can use. Once the CTs make it past a certain point, a teleporter will open up and allow the terrorists to advance to a second turret as a final defense.

The map features:

- 76 Fully breakable platforms that allow the CTs various paths to the end.
- 4 "safe houses" that are much harder to knock off(the base does not break or move)
- all platforms are respawnable.(respawn times vary based on the size of the plaform)
- random path remover system that will remove some paths to vary the gameplay at start.
- an AFK system(kills the afkers)
- 3 included songs for optional playback. (Xenogenocide - Black Hole Earth Consumption, DJ TiÃ«sto - Personal Reflexion, and Waterflame - -Control: Crowd- )



Map Requires mp_limitteams 0 server setting.
Player Slots: 36 (4 terrorist and 32 Counter-terrorists)
